name: Bizli
description:
Bangladesh's first super heroine movie based game Bizli. As a user choose Bobby or Ranojoy and play the 3D fighting game. Experience the over-the-top, visceral fighting of Bizli and her boy friend Rony in this action packed game.
Full 3D fighting
Real action
15 different style of fighting within the engine.
NOTICE:
Features high quality visuals. Performance is not optimized on devices with less than 1GB RAM.
Play the game and unlock exclusive rewards
